title: Angular Icon library options Schema
description: Creates a new icon library module in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the icon library module.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for your icon module?

iconType.description: The name of the icon type generated by svg-to-ts.
iconType.x-prompt: What's the name of the icon type generated by svg-to-ts?

iconInterface.description: The name of the icon interface generated by svg-to-ts.
iconInterface.x-prompt: What's the name of the icon interface generated by svg-to-ts?

iconImportPath.description: The path where the icon library should be imported from (either relative path or npm package name)
iconImportPath.x-prompt: What's the name of the icon library?

defaultIconSize.description: The default size of your icons
defaultIconSize.x-prompt: What's the default size of your icons (in px)?

installLibrary.description: Should we install your icon library from the provided iconImportPath?
installLibrary.x-prompt: Do you want us to automatically install the library from the provided path?

path.description: The path at which to create the icon module files, relative to the current workspace.
